thread.title: Drinking problems for Coronation Street as viewers notice major props blunder
thread.title_full: Drinking problems for Coronation Street as viewers notice major props blunder

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Drinking problems for Coronation Street as viewers notice major props blunder
text:
Drinking problems for Coronation Street as viewers notice major props blunder Eagle eyed fans noticed Kate Connor serving Toyah Battersby a much-needed drink from an empty bottle Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now RUNNING ON EMPTY! Coronation Street viewers spot a major props blunder Share this video Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coronation Street viewers noticed a big props blunder this week and couldn't get enough of the amusing and embarrassing mishap. 
Poor Kate Connor has recently started behind the bar in the Bistro and it's always going to take some getting used to when you're in a new job - but this probably isn't the best start. 
The waitress was trying to make Toyah Battersby feel better after a tough day, and eagle eyed fans noticed the awkward mistake as she placed a glass next to an empty bottle of wine. Time to pour a drink (Photo: ITV) Hmm, maybe not (Photo: ITV) Not the drink she hoped for (Photo: ITV) 
Now, they do say it's the thought that counts, but maybe not in this case. Read More 
Viewers were quick to take to Twitter to have a giggle at the mistake, with one joking that Kate might not be making the best impression. Yup, definitely empty (Photo: ITV) Well, she is new (Photo: ITV) Awkward! (Photo: ITV) 
"When the new barmaid tries to impress the boss & the first drink she serves is from an empty bottle #coronationstreet #corrie (sic)," they tweeted. 
Another wrote: "@itvcorrie Kate just got an empty bottle of wine out to pour toyah a glass!!! #emptybottle #corrie (sic)" Gareth Gates and Faye Brookes at the NTAs (Photo: Rex Features) 
Actress Faye Brooks won't take the awkward moment to heart though - particularly after winning an NTA for the role - and she's recently teased viewers with a potential sizzling love triangle with her character and sisters Sophie and Rosie Webster . Read More 
“I hope Kate and Sophie have a romance. Sophie is Kate’s Achilles heel. It’s a beautiful connection they have. But whether they will ever be more than friends, or not, you never know,” she told The Sun . Like us on Facebook
